WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

We developed one of our aplication using PHPExcel to generate .xls file. First we use an Windows Server 2003 R2 x86 and everything was working fine. After one month we migrated the application on another server (same hardware configuration) but we use Windows Server 2003R2 x64 whith same Apache an PHP.

After migration the excel generation was runngin very slow. Aproximately with 50% more time than before. Can you tell us what is the problem? Why this differente?
WorkItem.Summary: Php Excel run slower on Windows Server x64
